go_data.justification: Mgat1b is involved in the transfer of N-acetylglucosamine to growing glycan chains.
Mgat1b is necessary for the proper glycosylation of proteins, as evidenced by the accumulation of oligomannose N-glycans in Mgat1b-/- fish.
Mgat1b is required for normal embryonic development, as Mgat1b-/- fish exhibit delayed development and reduced survivability.
Mgat1b is necessary for proper skeletal muscle development, as Mgat1b-/- fish exhibit delayed skeletal muscle development and impaired locomotor activity.
Mgat1b is required for normal cardiac muscle development, as Mgat1b-/- fish exhibit delayed cardiac development.
Mgat1b is necessary for proper cell migration during embryonic development, as Mgat1b-/- fish exhibit impaired cell migration and reduced survivability.
Mgat1b is involved in the glycosylation of proteins at specific sites.
